within measures defined by Service Level Agreements Creating and maintaining logins synonyms and access privileges using roles controlling access to the database using operating system and Oracle security features Primary ADBA for multiple mission critical Oracle databases supporting applications operating in a high availability 24x7 environment Working closely with oracle support metalink to
